Domenico Losurdo (14 November 1941 – 28 June 2018) was an Italian Marxist philosopher and historian. He was born in Sannicandro di Bari, Italy. He was Dean of the Faculty of Education at the University of Urbino. Losurdo wrote '. He was critical of racism, slavery, and genocide.
Losurdo died on 28 June 2018 in Rome from esophageal cancer at the age of 76.
